Class ClientFieldGUI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc01.view.gui.ClientFieldGUI
public class ClientFieldGUI extends Object
Backend of gui that manages all about the players' fields

    • getAvailablePositions

      public List<Position> getAvailablePositions()

      the available positions where to place the Playable Cards in the field

    • setAvailablePositions

      public void setAvailablePositions(List<Position> availablePositions)
      Sets the available positions to place a card
      Parameters:
      availablePositions - available positions where to place the Playable Cards in the field

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int id, boolean front, Position position)
      Plays a card by adding it to the player's cards collection, setting its side, and placing it on the game field at a specified position.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the card to be played
      front - true if the card is played on the front, false otherwise
      position - the position on the game field where the card is placed

    • generateField

      public javafx.scene.layout.Pane generateField()
      Generates a graphical representation of the game field as a JavaFX Pane.
      Returns:
      a JavaFX Pane representing the generated game field with graphical elements

    • realX

      private double realX(int x)
      Converts the logical x-coordinate to the graphical x-coordinate on the game field.
      Parameters:
      x - the logical x-coordinate to be converted
      Returns:
      the corresponding graphical x-coordinate

    • realY

      private double realY(int y)

      Returns:
